title.rendered: Pernod Ricard India Foundation Partners With Smile Foundation for Better Healthcare

content.rendered:
Pernod Ricard India Foundation bringing healthcare to underserved communities

In a country where many still struggle to meet their basic needs, access to quality healthcare often feels out of reach. Recognising this, one of the Smile Foundation’s “Smile on Wheels” project, supported by Pernod Ricard India Foundation (PRIF), is bringing medical services to those who need them most.

With three mobile medical units, this initiative is delivering primary healthcare right to the doorsteps of underserved communities in Gurugram, Derabassi and Gwalior. These mobile units ensure that people in rural-urban slums receive timely medical care, improving health outcomes and addressing a critical gap in access to healthcare services. During the year 2023-24, we reached 50,117 beneficiaries. This collaboration reflects a shared commitment to making healthcare more accessible and improving lives where it’s needed the most.

Pernod Ricard India Foundation Partners With Smile Foundation for Better Healthcare

In a nation where the majority of the population struggles to meet their basic needs, accessing quality healthcare remains an elusive dream for many. Recognizing this pressing issue, Smile on Wheels has taken the initiative to provide healthcare solutions to the destitute and their communities through its Mobile Medical Unit.

With the generous support of Pernod Ricard India Foundation, three Smile on Wheels vans have been deployed to deliver primary healthcare services directly to the doorsteps of the underserved populations residing in rural-urban slums. These vans are currently operating in Gurugram, Derabassi, and Gwalior, catering to the healthcare needs of these marginalized communities.

The Smile on Wheels Mobile Medical Unit serves as a lifeline for those who struggle to access proper medical care due to various challenges. By bringing healthcare services to their doorstep, the initiative aims to bridge the gap and ensure that the underserved receive the medical attention they urgently require.

The collaboration between Smile on Wheels and PRIF exemplifies the power of partnerships and the shared commitment to making healthcare accessible to all. Through their combined efforts, they are making a tangible difference in the lives of the destitute and underserved, bringing hope and healing to those who need it most.
